metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38559 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A buffer overflow flaw was found in base/gdevdevn.c:1973 in devn_pcx_write_rle() in ghostscript. This issue may allow a local attacker to cause a denial of service via outputting a crafted PDF file for a DEVN device with gs.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38559` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.9
ghostscript-x - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.9
libgs9 - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.9
libgs9-common - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.9').
